songs.title: Makes Me Wonder (Just Blaze Remix)
songs.album: Call and Response: The Remix Album
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Wake up, blood-shot eye
Struggle to memorize
The way it felt between your thighs
Pleasure that made you cry
It feels so good to be bad
Not worth the aftermath, after that, after that
Try to get you back

[Pre-Chorus]
I still don't have a reason (reason)
And you don't have the time (time)
And it really makes me wonder if I ever gave a fuck about you and I

[Chorus]
So this is goodbye
Is this the end of you and I?
So this is goodbye
Is this the end of you and I?
So this is goodbye

[Verse 2]
Can't stop my spinning head
Decisions that made my bed
Now I must lay in it
And deal with things I've left unsaid
I want to dive into you
Forget what you're going through
I get behind, make your move
Forget about the truth

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause I still don't have a reason
And you don't have the time
And it really makes me wonder if I ever gave a fuck about you and I

[Chorus]
So this is goodbye
Is this the end of you and I?
So this is goodbye
Lying to my lovers eyes
So this is goodbye

[Bridge]
I've been here before
One day I'll wake up and it won't hurt anymore (Ho-oh-oh-oh)
You caught me in a lie (Ho-oh)
I have no alibi (Ho-oh)
The words you say don't have a meaning  (Ho-oh-oh-oh)

[Pre-Chorus 2]
'Cause I still don't have a reason
And you don't have the time
And it really makes me wonder if I ever gave a fuck about you and I
And so this is goodbye

[Chorus]
Is this the end of you and I?
So this is goodbye
Lying to my lovers eyes
So this is goodbye

[Breakdown]
Oh-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh
Ho-oh-oh-oh-oh

[Outro]
Oh-oh-oh, say goodbye
